QuestData.Title: The Path of the Protector
QuestData.CompletionText: Impressive, little one. You have gone through much trouble to gain the favor of the Bronze Flight. Your dedication is noted.$b$bThe signet ring of the defender will offer superior protection against the forces of evil.$b$bBe warned, once you have chosen your path, you will have no recourse should you change your mind.
QuestData.RewardText: Impressive, little one. You have gone through much trouble to gain the favor of the Bronze Flight. Your dedication is noted.$b$bThe signet ring of the defender will offer superior protection against the forces of evil.$b$bBe warned, once you have chosen your path, you will have no recourse should you change your mind.
